templates.name: Twitter Profile Analysis
templates.description: This project allows you to view a dashboard of any Twitter user timeline. Start by connecting your Twitter account in the Twitter block and selecting the user profile handles you wish to view.

templates.name: SalesForce dashboard
templates.description: Visualise data about accounts, lead, opportunities and sales.

templates.name: Stock portfolio
templates.description: Input your stock portfolio and watch as Omniscope maps the fields and produces a cool dashboard
